summary: Hyperscalers are aggressively increasing AI infrastructure investments (Microsoft >50% YoY Capex growth, Google prioritizing AI, Meta raising guidance). New model releases (GPT-5 rumored Q2 2024, Gemini 2 in development) drive demand. GPU rental prices ($3.16/hr) show modest softening but not a crash, indicating supply is catching up with demand rather than collapsing.
